text:
="preserve">Rubble (5 May 1989 – 3 July 2020) was a domestic cat owned by Michelle Foster of Exeter, Devon, England. Foster bought the cat as a kitten on or near her 20th birthday. Rubble, a Maine Coon-type cat, turned 31 in May 2020 and was from 3 January 2020 until her death the world's oldest verified living cat.
Rubble died on 3 July 2020, aged 31.
